= Design =

Here is the design of the project.

 *  WAV Parser
  *  parse-wav-file
  *  bytes->integer
  *  bytes->string
  *  bytes->wav-packet
 *  Operator Handler
  *  read-operator
  *  apply-operator
   *  apply-delay
   *  apply-cut
   *  apply-boost
   *  apply-overdub
   *  apply-fade-in
   *  apply-fade-out
   *  apply-fuzz
   *  apply-chipmunk
   *  apply-filter
 *  WAV Output
  *  put-signal
  *  display-signal
  *  display-signal-gui
